data.title: The Sentimental Agents in the Volyen Empire (Signed) by Doris Lessing: Very Good Hardcover (1983) First Edition., ISigned by Author(s)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9780224021302 - ISigned by Author(s) - First Edition. - Hardcover - Cape - 1983 - Condition: Very Good - Near Fine - Signed by Author(s) Externally fine in Fine DW But a label has been removed from the flyleaf & the end boards with slight damage to both at the front of the book. On the rear there is a very faint D where it has been deleted. The book was signed at Waterstones in Manchester. Signed on titlepage. - The Sentimental Agents in the Volyen Empire (Signed)
data.text:
About this Item

Signed by Author(s) Externally fine in Fine DW But a label has been removed from the flyleaf & the end boards with slight damage to both at the front of the book. On the rear there is a very faint D where it has been deleted. The book was signed at Waterstones in Manchester. Signed on titlepage. Seller Inventory # 65

Contact seller
